snippet.title: POLICE SENTRI Teaser
snippet.description: Police Sentri is a fun, quick, high- adrenaline multiplayer chasing game. Taking inspiration from the familiar childhood game of ‘Cops and Robbers’ and Hide & Seek. Available now on Google Play Store and itch.io.
